      • insertUser

        public static void insertUser(java.sql.Connection con,
                              java.lang.String fullname,
                              java.lang.String username,
                              java.lang.String password,
                              int admin)
                       throws java.sql.SQLException
        The method inserts a user to the database
        Parameters:
        con - Connection connecting the system to the database
        fullname - String containing the full name of the user to be created
        username - String containing the username of the user to be created
        password - String containing the encrypted password of the user to be created
        admin - Integer representing the ID of the administrator who created the user
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

                                        int userID)
                                 throws java.sql.SQLException

        Parameters:

        userID - Integer representing the ID of the user to be checked
        Returns:
        boolean indicating whether the user is indeed archived
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
